entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
